Class Facility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase

          • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.Facility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade, NamedBlade, NonBlockingBlade, Closeable, CommonReactor, Reactor

    public class Facility
extends NonBlockingReactor
implements NamedBlade
    A reactor parent, facilities are named and registered with Plant.

      • unregisterBladeSOp

        public SOp<NamedBlade> unregisterBladeSOp(java.lang.String _name)
        A request to unregister the named blade. The result of the request is the unregistered blade, or null.
        Parameters:
        _name - The name of the blade.
        Returns:
        The request to unregister.

      • registerBladeSOp

        public SOp<java.lang.Void> registerBladeSOp(NamedBlade _blade)
        A request to register a blade. The request throws an IllegalStateException if the name is a duplicate. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the name is invalid.
        Parameters:
        _blade - The blade being registered.
        Returns:
        The request to register.
